entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
